bibdata.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard
Information technology -- Telecommunications and information exchange between systems -- Local and metropolitan area networks -- Part 1AC: Media access control (MAC) service definition

ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard - Information technology -- Telecommunications and information exchange between systems -- Local and metropolitan area networks -- Part 1AC: Media access control (MAC) service definition

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The MAC Service and the Internal Sublayer Service (ISS) are defined in this standard. This standard specifies media-dependent convergence functions that map IEEE 802(R) MAC interfaces to the ISS. The MAC Service is derived from the ISS.

The MAC Service and the Internal Sublayer Service (ISS) are defined in this standard. This standard specifies media-dependent convergence functions that map IEEE 802&#174; MAC interfaces to the ISS. The MAC Service is derived from the ISS.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
